install.name: Glossary
install.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
install.description: Adds SEO support for Glossary component.

param.name: ignoreSource
param.label: Ignore multiple sources:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid handling:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour with your own Itemid.

param.name: overrideId
param.label: Override Itemid:
param.description: Itemid to always use with this component. Leave blank to use the default one.

param.name: letter
param.label: Add letter to term links:
param.description: If set to Yes, letter will be added to URL before term name.
